data.summary: Research audit completed for memory_terminal_interactive behavior, extension invocation path, container mode handling, and interactive-terminal TCP protocol.
data.primary_recommendation: Option A with explicit tool contract separation to remove action-schema collision and implement runtime adapter layer for local/container bridge.
risks: Container cannot access host-local GUI without bridge
Behavior drift between docs and implementations
